summary: REQ-12 and REQ-13 appear implemented (header layout/logo placement + landing-only orange calligraphy title). REQ-14 (footer social links behavior) cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff; only the GeekGoat link is clearly evidenced, while the X icon link/behavior is not visible. Diff also includes broader theming and copy changes beyond the request.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the footer "Follow me on" row, make only the GeekGoat icon and the X icon clickable; set the X icon click target to navigate to https://x.com/WillGeek4Food. Do not make the entire row clickable.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for the footer is truncated and only clearly shows a clickable GeekGoat icon link; it does not provide visible evidence of an X icon/link to https://x.com/WillGeek4Food, nor does it show whether the surrounding row/text is non-clickable.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/token and Tailwind design-system updates (OKLCH palette, added lookyloo-orange token, extended font families, plugins) beyond the specific header/landing/footer changes requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for header layout changes, landing H1 styling, and footer social link click targets; it does not request a broader theme overhaul or Tailwind config extension.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer copy/year and branding text changes (e.g., "2026 LookyLoo. A GeekDice dApp built with caffeine.ai").
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-14 only specifies clickability/targets for social icons and explicitly focuses on the "Follow me on" row behavior; it does not request changing footer copy/year text.
